remarks: The value of the value of vector addition in the closed kernel vector space dual.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lcdvaddval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvaddval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvaddval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcdvaddval.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdvaddval.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
lcdvaddval.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvaddval.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdvaddval.p $e |- .+b = ( +g ` C ) $.
lcdvaddval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvaddval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
lcdvaddval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. D ) $.
lcdvaddval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lcdvaddval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F .+b G ) ` X ) = ( ( F ` X ) .+ ( G ` X ) ) ) $.
